verses.verse: Now there was a man <WH376> of Benjamin <WH1144>, whose name <WH8034> was Kish <WH7027>, the son <WH1121> of Abiel <WH22>, the son <WH1121> of Zeror <WH6872>, the son <WH1121> of Bechorath <WH1064>, the son <WH1121> of Aphiah <WH647>, a Benjamite <WH1145>, a mighty <WH1368> man <WH376> of power <WH2428>.

And he had a son <WH1121>, whose name <WH8034> was Saul <WH7586>, a choice young man <WH970>, and good <WH2896>: and there was not among the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> a better <WH2896> person <WH376> than he <WH7926>: from his shoulders and upward <WH4605> he was higher <WH1364> than any of the people <WH5971>.

And the donkeys <WH860> of Kish <WH7027> Saul <WH7586>'s father <WH1> were lost <WH6>. And Kish <WH7027> said <WH559> to Saul <WH7586> his son <WH1121>, Take <WH3947> now one <WH259> of the servants <WH5288> with you <WH6965>, and arise, go <WH3212> seek <WH1245> the donkeys <WH860>.

And he passed through <WH5674> mountain <WH2022> Ephraim <WH669>, and passed through <WH5674> the land <WH776> of Shalisha <WH8031>, but they found <WH4672> them not <WH5674>: then they passed through the land <WH776> of Shalim <WH8171>, and there they were not <WH5674>: and he passed through the land <WH776> of the Benjamites <WH1145>, but they found them not <WH4672>.

And when they were come <WH935> to the land <WH776> of Zuph <WH6689>, Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to his servant <WH5288> that was with him <WH3212>, Come, and let us return <WH7725>; lest my father <WH1> leave <WH2308> caring for the donkeys <WH860>, and take thought for us <WH1672>.

And he said <WH559> unto him <WH5892>, Behold now, there is in this city a man <WH376> of God <WH430>, and he is an honorable <WH3513> man <WH376>; all that he says <WH1696> comes <WH935> surely to pass <WH935>: now let us go <WH3212> there <WH5046>; perhaps he can show us our way <WH1870> that we should go <WH1980>.

Then said <WH559> Saul <WH7586> to his servant <WH5288>, But <WH3212>, behold, if we go, what shall we bring <WH935> the man <WH376>? for the bread <WH3899> is spent <WH235> in our vessels <WH3627>, and there is not a present <WH8670> to bring <WH935> to the man <WH376> of God <WH430>: what have we?

And the servant <WH5288> answered <WH6030> Saul <WH7586> again <WH3254>, and said <WH559>, Behold <WH4672>, I have here at hand <WH3027> the fourth part <WH7253> of a shekel <WH8255> of silver <WH3701>: that will I give <WH5414> to the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, to tell <WH5046> us our way <WH1870>.

(Previously <WH6440> in Israel <WH3478>, when a man <WH376> went <WH3212> to inquire <WH1875> of God <WH430>, thus he spoke <WH559>, Come <WH3212>, and let us go <WH3212> to the seer <WH7200>: for he that is now <WH3117> called a Prophet <WH5030> was previously <WH6440> called <WH7121> a Seer <WH7200>.)

Then said <WH1697> Saul <WH7586> to his servant <WH5288>, Well <WH2896> said <WH559>; come <WH3212>, let us go <WH3212>. So they went <WH3212> unto the city <WH5892> where the man <WH376> of God was <WH430>.

And as they went up <WH5927> the hill <WH4608> to the city <WH5892>, they found <WH4672> young maidens <WH5291> going out <WH3318> to draw <WH7579> water <WH4325>, and said <WH559> unto them <WH3426>, Is the seer here <WH7200>?

And they answered <WH6030> them <WH559>, and said, He is <WH3426>; behold <WH6440>, he is before you <WH4116>: make hurry now <WH935>, for he came to day <WH3117> to the city <WH5892>; for there is a sacrifice <WH2077> of the people <WH5971> to day <WH3117> in the high place <WH1116>:

As soon as you be come <WH935> into the city <WH5892>, you shall directly <WH3651> find <WH4672> him <WH5927>, before he go up to the high place <WH1116> to eat <WH398>: for the people <WH5971> will not eat <WH398> until he come <WH935>, because he does bless <WH1288> the sacrifice <WH2077>; and afterwards <WH310> they eat <WH398> that are invited <WH7121>. Now therefore get you up <WH5927>; for about this time <WH3117> you shall find him <WH4672>.

And they went up <WH5927> into <WH8432> the city <WH5892>: and when they were come <WH935> into the city <WH5892>, behold <WH8050>, Samuel came out <WH3318> against <WH7125> them <WH5927>, for to go up to the high place <WH1116>.
Now the Lord <WH3068> had told <WH1540> Samuel <WH8050> in his ear <WH241> a <WH259> day <WH3117> before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586> came <WH935>, saying <WH559>,

Tomorrow <WH4279> about this time <WH6256> I will send <WH7971> you a man <WH376> out of the land <WH776> of Benjamin <WH1144>, and you shall anoint <WH4886> him to be captain <WH5057> over my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>, that he may save <WH3467> my people <WH5971> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>: for I have looked <WH7200> upon my people <WH5971>, because their cry <WH6818> is come unto me <WH935>.

And when Samuel <WH8050> saw <WH7200> Saul <WH7586>, the Lord <WH3068> said <WH6030> unto him <WH376>, Behold the man whom I spoke <WH559> to you of <WH6113>! this same shall reign over my people <WH5971>.
Then Saul <WH7586> drew near <WH5066> to Samuel <WH8050> in <WH8432> the gate <WH8179>, and said <WH559>, Tell <WH5046> me <WH335>, I pray you, where the seer <WH7200>'s house is <WH1004>.

And Samuel <WH8050> answered <WH6030> Saul <WH7586>, and said <WH559>, I am the seer <WH7200>: go up <WH5927> before <WH6440> me unto the high place <WH1116>; for you shall eat <WH398> with me today <WH3117>, and tomorrow <WH1242> I will let you go <WH7971>, and will tell <WH5046> you all that is in your heart <WH3824>.

And as for your donkeys <WH860> that were lost <WH6> three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ago <WH3117>, set <WH7760> not your mind <WH3820> on them <WH4672>; for they are found. And on whom is all the desire <WH2532> of Israel <WH3478>? Is it not on you <WH1>, and on all your father's house <WH1004>?

And Saul <WH7586> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>, Am not I a Benjamite <WH1145>, of the smallest <WH6996> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478>? and my family <WH4940> the least <WH6810> of all the families <WH4940> of the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin <WH1144>? why then speak <WH1696> you so to me <WH1697>?

And Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> Saul <WH7586> and his servant <WH5288>, and brought <WH935> them into the parlour <WH3957>, and made them sit <WH5414> in the best <WH7218> place <WH4725> among them that were bidden <WH7121>, which were about thirty <WH7970> persons <WH376>.
And Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> unto the cook <WH2876>, Bring <WH5414> the portion <WH4490> which I gave <WH5414> you <WH559>, of which I said unto you <WH7760>, Set it by you.

And the cook <WH2876> took up <WH7311> the shoulder <WH7785>, and that which was upon it <WH7760>, and set it before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586>. And Samuel said <WH559>, Behold that which is left <WH7604>! set <WH7760> it before <WH6440> you <WH398>, and eat: for unto this time <WH4150> has it been kept <WH8104> for you since I said <WH559>, I have invited <WH7121> the people <WH5971>. So Saul <WH7586> did eat <WH398> with Samuel <WH8050> that day <WH3117>.
And when they were come down <WH3381> from the high place <WH1116> into the city <WH5892>, Samuel talked <WH1696> with Saul <WH7586> upon the top of the house <WH1406>.

And they arose early <WH7925>: and it came to pass about the spring <WH5927> of the day <WH7837>, that Samuel <WH8050> called <WH7121> Saul <WH7586> to the top of the house <WH1406>, saying <WH559>, Up <WH6965>, that I may send you away <WH7971>. And Saul <WH7586> arose <WH6965>, and they went out <WH3318> both <WH8147> of them <WH8050>, he and Samuel, abroad <WH2351>.

And as they were going down <WH3381> to the end <WH7097> of the city <WH5892>, Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to Saul <WH7586>, Bid <WH559> the servant <WH5288> pass on <WH5674> before <WH6440> us <WH5674>, (and he passed on,) but stand <WH5975> you still a while <WH3117>, that I may show <WH8085> you the word <WH1697> of God <WH430>.
